question: Who has been named the Brand Ambassador of 2018 Women's World Boxing Championships (WWBC)?
explanation: Mary Kom, a five-time World Champion, has been named the Brand Ambassador of the 10th edition of theWomen\'s World Boxing Championships (WWBC-2018). The World Championships is scheduled to be held  at the IG Stadium\'s K.D. Jhadav Hall in New Delhi from November 15 and 24. It will see close to 300 pugilists from 70 countries across 10 weight categories, the tournament\'s highest-ever participation, including Olympic medalists, World and European Champions.
